headline.print_headline: Peru Drug Police Break Up Cocaine Ring at Airport
headline.main: Peru Drug Police Break Up Cocaine Ring at Airport

docs.snippet: Peru's counter-narcotics police broke up a ring that shipped cocaine from Lima's international airport to Mexico on commercial flights by swapping out unsuspecting passengers' luggage with identical suitcases, their commander announced Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Peru's counter-narcotics police broke up a ring that shipped cocaine from Lima's international airport to Mexico on commercial flights by swapping out unsuspecting passengers' luggage with identical suitcases, their commander announced Thursday.

headline.print_headline: LA Kings Shuffle Lines to Spark Cup Finals Win
headline.main: LA Kings Shuffle Lines to Spark Cup Finals Win

docs.snippet: The Los Angeles Kings reached the Stanley Cup finals with a zealous dedication to a detailed game plan — and a remarkable willingness to throw it out the window when necessary....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Kings reached the Stanley Cup finals with a zealous dedication to a detailed game plan — and a remarkable willingness to throw it out the window when necessary.

headline.print_headline: City Council OKs Charitable Trust for Detroit Art
headline.main: City Council OKs Charitable Trust for Detroit Art

docs.snippet: The Detroit City Council has approved a resolution to move artwork threatened by the city's bankruptcy into a charitable trust....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Detroit City Council has approved a resolution to move artwork threatened by the city's bankruptcy into a charitable trust.

docs.snippet: Ben Crane shot a 7-under 63 on Thursday at TPC at Southwind to take the lead in the suspended first round of the St. Jude Classic....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ben Crane shot a 7-under 63 on Thursday at TPC at Southwind to take the lead in the suspended first round of the St. Jude Classic.

headline.print_headline: Key Colombia Oil Pipeline Shut Again by Bomb Attack: Source
headline.main: Key Colombia Oil Pipeline Shut Again by Bomb Attack: Source

docs.snippet: A bomb attack blamed on Colombia's leftist guerrillas has shut down the key Cano Limon-Covenas oil pipeline, a source at state-run oil company Ecopetrol which owns the pipeline, said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A bomb attack blamed on Colombia's leftist guerrillas has shut down the key Cano Limon-Covenas oil pipeline, a source at state-run oil company Ecopetrol which owns the pipeline, said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Lawyers Scan GM Report for Details to Bolster Negligence Suits
headline.main: Lawyers Scan GM Report for Details to Bolster Negligence Suits

docs.snippet: Plaintiffs' lawyers have begun scouring General Motors Co's report on its handling of faulty ignition switches that have been tied to 13 deaths and say they are finding details that could bolster their negligence cases....
docs.lead_paragraph: Plaintiffs' lawyers have begun scouring General Motors Co's report on its handling of faulty ignition switches that have been tied to 13 deaths and say they are finding details that could bolster their negligence cases.

headline.print_headline: GM Dismissed Vice President, Two Directors in Recall Probe: Sources
headline.main: GM Dismissed Vice President, Two Directors in Recall Probe: Sources

docs.snippet: General Motors Co dismissed several high-ranking executives, including at least one vice president and two directors, for their roles in the still-unfolding drama over deadly ignition switches in older GM cars, people familiar with the matter told...
docs.lead_paragraph: General Motors Co dismissed several high-ranking executives, including at least one vice president and two directors, for their roles in the still-unfolding drama over deadly ignition switches in older GM cars, people familiar with the matter told Reuters.

headline.print_headline: James 11th Player With 1,000 NBA Playoff Assists
headline.main: James 11th Player With 1,000 NBA Playoff Assists

docs.snippet: LeBron James is the 11th player in NBA history with 1,000 postseason assists....
docs.lead_paragraph: LeBron James is the 11th player in NBA history with 1,000 postseason assists.

headline.print_headline: Oregon Basketball Rape Accuser: 'I Am Angry'
headline.main: Oregon Basketball Rape Accuser: 'I Am Angry'

docs.snippet: A student who said she was sexually assaulted by three members of the University of Oregon men's basketball team sent an open letter to the school newspaper in which she asserts the athletic department prioritizes winning over student safety....
docs.lead_paragraph: A student who said she was sexually assaulted by three members of the University of Oregon men's basketball team sent an open letter to the school newspaper in which she asserts the athletic department prioritizes winning over student safety.
